text: The 'St. Stanislaus Kostka Mission is a historic church building in Rathdrum, Idaho. It was built in 1900, and designed in the Gothic Revival architectural style. With It is the oldest Roman Catholic church built with bricks in the state of Idaho. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since November 17, 1977. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Kootenai County, Idaho Category:Gothic Revival architecture in Idaho Category:Roman Catholic churches completed in 1900 Category:Churches on the National Register of Historic Places in Idaho
title: St. Stanislaus Kostka Mission
